name: Spot Media Solutions Sdn. Bhd.
description: Operator of an online advertising platform intended to allow advertisers, publishers, and intermediaries to control each impression. The company's platform offers an online marketplace that connects networks, demand-side platforms, supply-side platforms, and other parties and features pre- and post-bid fraud detection algorithms, advanced reports, and a control panel, enabling businesses to eliminate all fraud pre-bid and exercise full control over their advertisements.
